title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-contained Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma & other models packaged as runnable Docker-like CLI tools with a built-in model registry.

title: ollama-python
summary: First-party async Python client and SDK for the Ollama API; install via pip install ollama.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript / TypeScript client for Node and browsers; npm install ollama.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: PyPI package adding Ollama as a LangChain LLM and embeddings provider; maintained by LangChain.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Open-source ChatGPT-style web interface for any Ollama model; runs in Docker with one command.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Cross-platform TUI (text UI) client written in Rust for chatting with Ollama models offline.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that pipes GitHub Copilot prompts to a local Ollama model instead of OpenAI.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration letting you use Ollama models as generators or embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java / Kotlin SDK published to Maven Central for integrating Ollama into JVM applications.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community Ruby gem wrapping the Ollama REST API with idiomatic Ruby syntax.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET 8 SDK and CLI for Ollama; supports chat, completion, and embeddings via System.Net.Http.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker image (ollama/ollama) with CUDA and CPU variants plus docker-compose examples.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node-selector and autoscaling.

title: ollama-gpt-cli
summary: Minimal Node CLI that turns any Ollama model into an interactive GPT shell with markdown rendering.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community-curated recipes for fine-tuning, RAG, function-calling and multi-modal setups with Ollama.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Python Discord.py bot that answers server questions using a local Ollama model instead of paid APIs.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds a “Ask Ollama” command to summarize or rewrite notes with local LLMs.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Streamlit app template for building private Retrieval-Augmented Generation pipelines backed by Ollama embeddings.

title: ollama-nim
summary: Nim language client for Ollama with compile-time URL validation and async HTTP requests.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate on crates.io providing strongly-typed async bindings to the Ollama REST API.
